name: InteractiveViewer
desc: A widget that enables pan and zoom interactions with its child.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: The alignment of the child's origin, relative to the size of the box.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: If set to [Clip.none], the child may extend beyond the size of the InteractiveViewer, but it will not receive gestures in these areas. Be sure that the InteractiveViewer is the desired size when using [Clip.none].

fields.name: panAxis
fields.desc: When set to [PanAxis.aligned], panning is only allowed in the horizontal axis or the vertical axis, diagonal panning is not allowed.

fields.name: boundaryMargin
fields.desc: A margin for the visible boundaries of the child.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: Builds the child of this widget.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The child [Widget] that is transformed by InteractiveViewer.

fields.name: constrained
fields.desc: Whether the normal size constraints at this point in the widget tree are applied to the child.

fields.name: panEnabled
fields.desc: If false, the user will be prevented from panning.

fields.name: scaleEnabled
fields.desc: If false, the user will be prevented from scaling.

fields.name: scaleFactor
fields.desc: Determines the amount of scale to be performed per pointer scroll.

fields.name: interactionEndFrictionCoefficient
fields.desc: Changes the deceleration behavior after a gesture.

fields.name: onInteractionEnd
fields.desc: Called when the user ends a pan or scale gesture on the widget.

fields.name: onInteractionStart
fields.desc: Called when the user begins a pan or scale gesture on the widget.

fields.name: onInteractionUpdate
fields.desc: Called when the user updates a pan or scale gesture on the widget.

fields.name: transformationController
fields.desc: A [TransformationController] for the transformation performed on the child.
